The article published by NetLiveMedia: com, which reported that Buju Banton had committed suicide in his prison cell, was found to be a hoax news article.
The website: NetLiveMedia.com, has a history of publishing fake news stories, including multiple false claims about Buju Banton.
The Federal Bureau of Prisons still list: contradicting the claim of his suicide.
Buju Banton himself: through a message relayed by Lorna Strachan, denied the rumors of his death or suicide and expressed a preference for rumors of his freedom or being out on bail.
